mapper.select: select count(id) from guestbook where id like '%${findStr}%' or doc like '%${findStr}%' or nal like '%${findStr}%'
select * from guestbook where id like '%${findStr}%' or doc like '%${findStr}%' or nal like '%${findStr}%' order by nal desc, id asc limit #{startNo}, #{listSize}
select * from guestbook order by sno desc limit 0,10
mapper.insert: insert into guestbook(id, doc, nal, pwd) values(#{id}, #{doc}, now(), #{pwd} )
mapper.delete: delete from guestbook where sno = #{sno} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.update: update guestbook set doc=#{doc} where sno = #{sno} and pwd = #{pwd}
